name: Demoshot - Thunder
effects: Physical lightning damage (2x, ATK) to all enemies

desc_short: Lightning damage and chance of confusing all enemies

desc_long: Deals lightning damage to all enemies and adds chance of confusing them.
對全體敵人發動雷屬性攻擊，一定機率施加混亂效果。
적 전체에 번개속성 피해를 주고, 일정 확률로 혼란을 부여합니다.
Dégâts de foudre et chance de rendre confus tous les ennemis
Fügt allen Gegnern Blitzschaden zu und blendet und Chance, sie zu verwirren.
Inflige daño de rayo y posibilidad de confundir a todos los enemigos.
